use_dot_product: whether to use the dot product
use_const_emb: whether to use the const embbeding
negative_sampling_rate: negative sampling rate. set to -1 to not use negative sampling
train_negative_model: whether we are training the negative model
threshold: if a cell in the Prob matrix has the value > threshold, it will be a positive example. Otherwise a negative example
checkpoint: Path to the .pt file of a model. Use it to resume training
